Question: What is the first name, last name, and role of the user with userId 'U123'?
Cypher:
MATCH (user:User)
WHERE user.userId="U123"
RETURN user, user.firstName, user.lastName, user.role
Rewrite: What is the first name, last name, and role of the user whose userId is 'U123'?

Question: List the project name, description, and status for projects that started between January 1, 2022, and December 31, 2022.
Cypher:
MATCH (project:Project)
WHERE project.startDate >= date('2022-01-01') AND project.startDate <= date('2022-12-31')
RETURN project, project.name, project.description, project.status
Rewrite: Provide the name, description, and current status of projects initiated between January 1, 2022, and December 31, 2022.

Question: Retrieve the name and description of the team with teamId 'T456' which has more than 10 members.
Cypher:
MATCH (team:Team {teamId: "T456"})<-[:MEMBER_OF]-(user:User)
WITH team, count(user) AS memberCount
WHERE memberCount > 10
RETURN team, team.name, team.description
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (team:Team {teamId: "T456"})<-[relation2:MEMBER_OF]-(user:User)
WITH team, count(user) AS memberCount
WHERE memberCount > 10
RETURN relation2, user, team, team.name, team.description

Question: Fetch all details regarding the milestone with a milestoneId 'M789' that has passed its deadline.
Cypher:
MATCH (milestone:Milestone)
WHERE milestone.milestoneId = 'M789' AND milestone.deadline < date()
RETURN milestone, milestone.title, milestone.description, milestone.deadline
Rewrite: Retrieve all information about the milestone labeled with milestoneId 'M789' that has exceeded its deadline.

Question: Show the taskId, name, status, estimatedHours, actualHours, and dueDate for tasks that are 'High' priority and are overdue.
Cypher:
MATCH (task:Task)
WHERE task.priority="High" AND task.dueDate < date() AND task.status="overdue"
RETURN task, task.taskId, task.name, task.status, task.estimatedHours, task.actualHours, task.dueDate
Rewrite: Display the taskId, name, status, estimatedHours, actualHours, and dueDate for tasks with a 'High' priority that have passed their dueDate.

Question: Display the commentId, text, and timestamp for comments made after January 1, 2023.
Cypher:
MATCH (comment:Comment)
WHERE comment.timestamp > datetime('2023-01-01T00:00:00')
RETURN comment, comment.commentId, comment.text, comment.timestamp
Rewrite: Show the commentId, text, and timestamp of comments posted since January 1, 2023.

Question: How many projects are currently in 'Active' status?
Cypher:
MATCH (project:Project)
WHERE project.status="Active"
RETURN COUNT(project) AS ActiveProjectCount
Rewrite: How many projects currently have an 'Active' status?

Question: What is the average estimated hours for tasks assigned in the year 2022?
Cypher:
MATCH (task:Task)-[assigned:ASSIGNED_TO]->(user:User)
WHERE assigned.assignedDate.year = 2022
RETURN avg(task.estimatedHours) AS AverageEstimatedHours
Rewrite: What are the typical estimated hours for tasks allocated in the year 2022?

Question: Count the number of Teams that have 'Engineering' as part of their team name.
Cypher:
MATCH (team:Team)
WHERE team.name CONTAINS "Engineering"
RETURN COUNT(team)
Rewrite: Calculate how many Teams include 'Engineering' in their team name.

Question: What is the total number of tasks that are marked as 'Completed' across all projects?
Cypher:
MATCH (task:Task)
WHERE task.status = "Completed"
RETURN COUNT(task) AS TotalCompletedTasks
Rewrite: How many tasks have been marked as 'Completed' in all projects?

Question: Calculate the maximum, minimum, average, and total actual hours spent on tasks within the 'Development' project.
Cypher:
MATCH (task:Task)<-[:INCLUDES_TASK]-(project:Project)
WHERE project.name="Development"
RETURN max(task.actualHours) AS MaxHours, min(task.actualHours) AS MinHours, avg(task.actualHours) AS AvgHours, sum(task.actualHours) AS TotalHours
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (task:Task)<-[relation2:INCLUDES_TASK]-(project:Project)
WHERE project.name="Development"
RETURN max(task.actualHours) AS MaxHours, min(task.actualHours) AS MinHours, avg(task.actualHours) AS AvgHours, sum(task.actualHours) AS TotalHours
Rewrite: Determine the maximum, minimum, average, and total actual hours spent on tasks in the 'Development' project.

Question: How many Users hold the role of 'Manager' across all teams?
Cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[membership:MEMBER_OF]->(team:Team)
WHERE membership.role = "Manager"
RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT user)
Rewrite: How many Users are assigned the 'Manager' role in all teams?
